Song.title: What a Beautiful Name
Song.copyright: Ben Fielding, Brooke Ligertwood | Â© 2016 Hillsong Music Publishing

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Y[C]ou were the Word at the beginning One With G[F]od the Lord[Am7] Most H[G]igh [Am7]Your veiled glory in cre[C]ation Now revealed in[F] You [Am]our Chr[G]ist
Chorus 1: What a beautiful Name it [C]is, What a beautiful Name it [G]is The Name of J[Am7]esus Ch[G]rist my Ki[F]ng What a beautiful Name it [C/E]is, Nothing compares to [G]this What a beautiful Name it [Am7]is, The [G]Name of [F]Jesus
Verse 2: Y[C]ou didn't want heaven without us So Jesus [F]You brought [Am]heaven d[G]own M[Am]y sin was g[G]reat, Y[C]our love was greater What c[F]ould [Am]seperate us n[G]ow
Chorus 2: What a wonderful Name it [C]is, What a wonderful Name it i[G]s The Name of J[Am7]esus Ch[G]rist my [F]King What a wonderful Name i[C/E]t is, Nothing compares to[G] this What a wonderful Name it[Am7] is, The Na[G]me of Jes[F]us What a wonderful Name it[Am7] is, The Na[G]me of Jes[F]us
Instrumental: [| F ///| G /// | Am7 /// | C/E ///|]
{new_page} Bridge: Death could not hold [F]you, The veil tore before[G] You You silenced the [Am7]boast of sin and gr[C/E]ave The heavens are ro[F]aring, the praise of Your g[G]lory For you are ra[Am7]ised to life a[G]gain You have no ri[F]val, You have no Eq[G]ual Now and for[Am7]ever God You [C/E]reign Yours is the Kin[F]gdom, Yours is the gl[G]ory Yours is the [Am7]Name above all [G]names
Chorus 3: What a powerful Name it i[C]s, What a powerful Name it i[G]s The Name of Je[Am7]sus Chr[G]ist my K[F]ing What a powerful Name it[C/E] is, Nothing can stand aga[G]inst What a powerful Name it [Am7]is, The Na[G]me of Jes[F]us What a powerful Name it [Am7]is, The Na[G]me of Jes[F]us
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 you were the word at the beginning one with god the lord most high your veiled glory in creation now revealed in you our christ chorus 1 what a beautiful name it is what a beautiful name it is the name of jesus christ my king what a beautiful name it is nothing compares to this what a beautiful name it is the name of jesus verse 2 you didnt want heaven without us so jesus you brought heaven down my sin was great your love was greater what could seperate us now chorus 2 what a wonderful name it is what a wonderful name it is the name of jesus christ my king what a wonderful name it is nothing compares to this what a wonderful name it is the name of jesus what a wonderful name it is the name of jesus instrumental bridge death could not hold you the veil tore before you you silenced the boast of sin and grave the heavens are roaring the praise of your glory for you are raised to life again you have no rival you have no equal now and forever god you reign yours is the kingdom yours is the glory yours is the name above all names chorus 3 what a powerful name it is what a powerful name it is the name of jesus christ my king what a powerful name it is nothing can stand against what a powerful name it is the name of jesus what a powerful name it is the name of jesus
